name: 陳維昌
objective:
本課程旨在提供研究生關於數位通訊與通訊網路的基本數學知識。包含以下主題：

1. 隨機變數複習
2. 隨機過程簡介
3. 實數值高斯隨機向量和過程
4. Karhunen-Loeve表示法
5. 窄帶隨機過程和帶通系統
6. 其他隨機過程與應用（Poisson、Markov...等）

部分課程將以英語授課。

This course aims at providing graduate students with the essential mathematical background for digital communications and communication networks. The course contains the following topics:

1. Review of Random Variables
2. Introduction to Random Processes
3. Real-Valued Gaussian Random Vectors and Processes
4. Karhunen–Loeve Representation
5. Narrowband Processes and Bandpass Systems
6. Other Random Processes and Their Applications (Poisson Processes, Markov Processes, etc.)

Parts of the course will be given in English.
